title.en: Goodwall joins our community of partners

description.en: Join us in welcoming our most recent partner, Goodwall, the next-generation community for students and young professionals to connect on shared interests, showcase themselves and discover learning and earning opportunities. With a community of more than 1 million members in 150+ countries, Goodwall is becoming the world leader in engaging and supporting Gen Z talents to reach their full potential and impact society positively.
